channel.title: Crashed in the toilets after the resonance cascade
channel.description: as far as I can remember, I had a Barney following me and I walked into the zombie in the changing rooms and Barney killed him. I then went to the toilets and the zombie popped out and after he died I put some toilet paper in the trash can and then pressed E on the hand drier. I then went to leave but then this happened: [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/33908159/Black%20Mesa%20Engine%20Error.png[/img] I've attached the .mdmp file hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T16_4_10C0.mdmp (110 KB)
